name: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 16 ounce bag frozen French cut green beans
3 ounces fresh mushrooms, chopped, about 8 small

instructions.en: Cook the green beans as directed on the package; drain well.
Saut√© the mushrooms, celery and onion in the butter until very soft and starting to brown a bit.
Add the broth; bring to a boil. Let liquid reduce by half.
Stir in the cream. Bring to a boil and cook until reduced, starting to thicken and turning brownish from the mushrooms.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Stir the tuna and mushroom soup mixture into the green beans.
Heat over medium-low heat until hot and bubbly; add salt and pepper, if needed.

notes: This recipe makes 4-6 servings. Do not freeze. Nutritional information is provided for 1/4, 1/5, and 1/6 of the recipe.
